name: Path T
title: Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  TNM does not include an in situ category for tumors of the adrenal gland. Assign TX and behavior code /2 for in situ cases.

**Note 2:** For the following descriptions, assign the appropriate T category based on the tumor size.

    Invasive carcinoma confined to adrenal gland
    Localized, NOS
rows:
Tumor of any size with local invasion, 
but not invading adjacent organs

Adjacent connective tissue 
   Gerota's  fascia

Stated as T3

Tumor of any size with invasion of
adjacent organs

Adjacent organs/structures:
    Kidney, ipsilateral or NOS
    Pancreas
    Retroperitoneal structures including:
        Great vessels:
            Aorta
            Inferior vena cava

Further contiguous extension including:
    Diaphragm
    Liver
    Spleen

Stated as T4

In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive

Unknown; extension not stated
Not documented in patient record

Tumor 5 cm or less in greatest dimension, 
no extra-adrenal invasion
Tumor greater than 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion
